entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:42 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.1°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
